Text: Thanks again. Unpopular opinion but I like this book and, besides the Third Army arc, have enjoyed it a lot.

y'know it's weird, but i've never read a book about red lanterns. except i think i read a backup story by johns with the origin of the one's that was a cat. was that a sinestro corps cat or a red lantern cat?

waitaminute, whatthehelldidijustsay? ((shakes head)) i'm a comic book nerd.
HELLLLLL YEAH! I love the Red Lanterns! Thank you STFmaryville!
